title: Emerald & Diamond 'Addigai' Necklace - A Touch of Timeless Elegance
materials: Rich Green). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This stunning necklace features a cascading design with floral diamond motifs interspersed with vivid Zambian emeralds. The intricate openwork setting maximizes the brilliance of each diamond. The flexible design ensures a comfortable and elegant drape. Contemporary twist on the classic Addigai style, making it versatile for both traditional and modern wear.
occasions: and upscale evening events. Can also be styled with modern attire for a sophisticated statement.
description: A contemporary masterpiece blending the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry with modern design aesthetics. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds ensure a lasting investment. The unique design will make you the center of attention, exuding sophistication and grace. The Hyderabadi Polish guarantees a long-lasting shine, making this a cherished heirloom piece.
